item.title: New-Clear
item.description: An open IoT platform for radiation level tracking via fleet of crowd-sourced Geiger counters called NEW-PLANT, clinched 1st Runner up in EIC 2019. Read more at this Medium article written by my teammate, Lee Wei Juin. Technologies Embedded IoT MQTT Images ‹ ›
